title: Looking for a duo to climb from Bronze Up
body: I main adc and second support, i play meta champs and out of meta champs. I've been having a hard time ranking up because of the constant feeding in other roles and trolls doing their own thing. [](https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Bong+Hit+Ben) looking for either an ADC or a Support to pair up with. Would help if you could have team speak as i have a channel or i can also use discord.

replies.body:
supp main. Add me.
If not I'll add you when next online
I'm keen, I'll play flex with you
